mosinstall.name: D4J eZine Newsletter v1.1
mosinstall.author: DesignForJoomla.com
mosinstall.description: Newsletter subscribe/unsubscribe module for eZine Joomla extension v2.1 and above

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: list_page
param.label: Show Page List
param.description: Display list of published eZine page so user can choose which page to subscribe to or unsubscribe from

param.name: newsletter_page
param.label: Newsletter Page
param.description: If you choose not to display the list of published eZine page, please enter the name of those eZine pages you want user to subscribe to or unsubscribe from here (separate by comma)

param.name: input_width
param.label: Input Field Width
param.description: Width in character of the name and email input fields

param.name: pre_text
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: Text to display above list of eZine page to subscribe to or unsubscribe from

param.name: post_text
param.label: Post-text
param.description: Text to display below list of eZine page to subscribe to or unsubscribe from

param.name: subscribe_button
param.label: Subscribe Button Text
param.description: Text of button to subscribe to newsletter

param.name: unsubscribe_button
param.label: Unsubscribe Button Text
param.description: Text of button to unsubscribe from newsletter

param.name: submit_button
param.label: Submit Button Text
param.description: Text of button to submit the form
